official_title: To amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to exclude cooperative employing units from multiple employer welfare arrangements.

summary.text: Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (ERISA) to exclude cooperative employing units from multiple employer welfare arrangements.
